entry.title: Zig-Zag Unbleached Rolling Papers 1 1/4
entry.summary:
Vendor: zig-zag
Type: Rolling Paper
Price: 48.99

From the rolling paper experts at Zig-Zag comes Unbleached Rolling Papers 1 ¼. These premium blended fiber papers are 100% unbleached for a smooth smoke without any harsh chemical taste. They measure 78mm x 44mm and include 50 papers per booklet, with 25 booklets per carton.

Crafted from the finest blend of natural fibers, these uncompromising papers deliver a slow, even burn. Zig-Zags have a thin glue line derived from the sap of the African acacia tree. The natural properties of gum Arabic provide a consistent seal without impacting the taste of your smoke. Roll, light, and enjoy a premium smoking experience with Zig-Zag Organic Hemp.

 

  • Smooth & Slow Burning
  • 78mm x 44mm
  • Unbleached and Ultra Thin
  • 100% Natural Gum Arabic
  • 25 Booklets per Carton, 50 Papers per Booklet.
  • POP Display Tray Included

entry.title: Canadian Lumber-Greens Cones-98/26-Medium 24 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Canadian Lumber
Type: Rolling Paper
Price: 42.00

Unrefined, unbleached, and 100% all-natural. Canadian Lumber All-Natural Pre-Rolled Cones are the perfect no-fuss rolling solution for the mindful smoker.

These elegant pre-rolled cones are available in Canadian Lumber’s signature varieties: The Greens, The Woods, and The Hippy, and each variety has its own unique characteristics.

The Greens

The Greens by Canadian Lumber are slow-burning hemp papers. They are made from all-natural, unrefined hemp so unprocessed that you can see the individual raw hemp fibres. Hemp naturally holds moisture, making Canadian Lumber’s “The Greens” their slowest-burning papers. The unrefined fibres help produce a smooth, even burn that will go the distance.

The Hippy

The Hippy by Canadian Lumber are easy-rolling papers made from a 50/50 blend of Flax and Hemp. This high-percentage Flax blend produces a soft, smooth texture that is like rice paper, but free from any bleach or other harsh chemicals. The result is a smote that is both easy to roll and easy to smoke. “The Hippy” makes for an all-around pleasant and enjoyable smoking experience.

The Woods

The Woods by Canadian Lumber are ultra-thin wood pulp papers. They are made from 100% all-natural, unrefined, and unbleached wood pulp that retains its natural brown colour without the use of any dyes or harsh chemicals. Canadian Lumber has pressed these to an impressive 12.5 gsm, making them one of the thinnest wood-based papers found anywhere. For classic, ultra-thin joint papers, try spending some time in “The Woods.”


Canadian Lumber’s all-natural and unrefined rolling papers bring you as close to the raw plant as you can get.  Even the glue has been replaced with an Arabic gum seal, which is like a tree sap that is triple distilled and sourced from a conflict-free region in West Africa.  Their unbleached and unrefined papers proudly feature visible raw plant fibres and provide a smooth and natural even burn.  The papers are tested for allergens at Canada’s Guelph University and are fully TUV SUD certified for European markets. You can rest assured that with Canadian Lumber, you will be smoking as nature intended.

entry.title: Canadian Lumber Rolling Papers-1 1/4 with Tips Pack of 22
entry.summary:
Vendor: Canadian Lumber
Type: Rolling Paper
Price: 29.90

Unrefined, unbleached, and 100% all-natural. Canadian Lumber Rolling Papers make an ideal companion for the mindful smoker.

These papers come in three varieties: The Greens, The Woods, and The Hippy, and each type has its own unique characteristics.

Greens

The Greens by Canadian Lumber are slow-burning hemp papers. They are made from all-natural, unrefined hemp so unprocessed that you can see the individual raw hemp fibres. Hemp naturally holds moisture, making Canadian Lumber’s “The Greens” their slowest-burning papers. The unrefined fibres help produce a smooth, even burn that will go the distance.

Woods

The Woods by Canadian Lumber are ultra-thin wood pulp papers. They are made from 100% all-natural, unrefined, and unbleached wood pulp that retains its natural brown colour without the use of any dyes or harsh chemicals. Canadian Lumber has pressed these to an impressive 12.5 gsm, making them one of the thinnest wood-based papers found anywhere. For classic, ultra-thin joint papers, try spending some time in “The Woods.”

The Hippy

The Hippy by Canadian Lumber are easy-rolling papers made from a 50/50 blend of Flax and Hemp. This high-percentage Flax blend produces a soft, smooth texture that is like rice paper, but free from any bleach or other harsh chemicals. The result is a smote that is both easy to roll and easy to smoke. “The Hippy” makes for an all-around pleasant and enjoyable smoking experience.


Canadian Lumber rolling papers are 100% all-natural including the Arabic gum seal. The Arabic gum used is similar to tree sap and sourced from a conflict-free company in West Africa. Unbleached and unrefined means that you can see the fibers still intact in the paper. This allows for a clean and natural even burn.

Canadian Lumber papers are lab-tested for allergens in Canada by Guelph University with the results published on their website. Their products are also fully TUV SUD Certified for European markets.

entry.title: King Palms Pre-Roll Slim Pouch 1.25gram 24/box
entry.summary:
Vendor: King Palms
Type: Rolling Paper
Price: 74.90

King Palm offers the best hand-rolled natural leaves for those looking for the slowest and smoothest burning smoke there is. King Palm leaves are free of tobacco, flavours, additives, preservatives, and glue. The natural corn-husk filter will be one of the best filter tips you have ever used, it will help to make sure no loose herbs will fall through and will also eliminate oils from getting into your mouth. You can also bite or squeeze the tip for a tighter draw, which will result in a cooler smoke. We are confident that you will find these natural leaves to be better quality and much cleaner than the common wrapping papers on the market.

Just Fill It Tightly compress your choice of herbs, but without using extreme force. Use a semi-chunky grind for maximum flavour. Our leaf wraps have a very mild earthy taste and do not alter the flavours of the herbs you are using.

Super Slow Burning - Real Cordia Leaf Free of: Tobacco, Glue, Flavours, & Additives.

Hand-Rolled Leaf and Hand-Rolled Corn Husk Filter  Bite or Squeeze the filter for a tighter draw and cooler smoke. We make and use the Worlds Strongest Corn Husk Filter.Â

entry.title: Raw-Rolling Machine Hemp Plastic-King Size 110mm 12/Box
entry.summary:
Vendor: Raw
Type: Rolling Machine
Price: 23.00

Roll up perfect, effortless joints every time with the RAW Help Plastic Roller, available in King Size 110 mm length.

  • Compatible with 110 mm king size papers
  • Double-thick vinyl rolling aprons
  • Eco-friendly hemp plastic
  • Made in Indonesia
  • Box of 12

The rolling masters at RAW are committed both to the art of the roll and to the environment. It’s only natural that they would introduce the world’s first rolling machine made from natural hemp composite plastic.  Made in the oldest existing rolling machine factory on earth, on Java Island in Indonesia, this factory was established almost 100 years ago to make hand rolling machines for the local clove cigarette industry. Today, they still producing hand rolling machines at these very same factories.

entry.title: High Hemp-Hemp Wraps 2X-Bare Berry-25/Box 2/Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: High Hemp
Type: Hemp Wraps
Price: 20.90

High Hemp Co was the first company to create a line of fully organic, herbal wraps. A lot of people want a thick, flavoured blunt wrap without using tobacco. Made from 100% hemp, they are not only tobacco free but are made without nicotine or any of the toxic additives associated with it.

All high hemp wraps are organic, vegan, gluten free and made without the use of GMO’s. They include a wooden tool to help pack your wrap effectively and efficiently. Bare Berry wraps have a deliciously juicy taste. Made from California raspberries, blueberries and blackberries these wraps are sweet with a hint of sour for a berry delectable smoke session.

Every package is airtight and resealable. Each pack of contains 2 wraps and each box comes with 15 packs.

entry.title: OCB-Unbleached Cones 32/Pack-King Size
entry.summary:
Vendor: OCB
Type: Rolling Paper
Price: 33.60

 

Hailing from France, OCB has been producing papers for over 100 years. Today, they are available in 6 continents and are trendsetters in the rolling paper world. OCB Virgin papers are an unbleached, ultra-thin rolling paper.

Rolled to perfection and waiting for you to pack them OCB unbleached cones deliver a smooth, pure smoking session. These 100% natural papers are ultra thin, unrefined wood fiber and feel soft to the touch. Using a vegetarian and non-GMO glue ensures a pleasant smoking experience.

A true delight to smoke, OCB Virgin pre-rolled cones come in a pack of 3 and contain 32 packs per box. King size cones are ideal for a qualified connoisseur or a large group setting.
